name: spotlight-ui
description: a simple canvas-based spotlight that can be used to highlight elements

scripts.bundle: browserify dist/spotlight.js -o bundle/spotlight.js && uglifyjs -mc -o bundle/spotlight.min.js dist/spotlight.js
scripts.transpile: babel src/ --out-dir dist --source-maps inline && cp src/defaults.json dist/defaults.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run transpile && npm run bundle && npm run build-demo && npm run docs

author: David Figatner
